appeal_from: U.S. District Court for Hawaii, Honolulu
case_name: State of Hawaii v. Donald Trump

docket_entries.description: DOCKETED CAUSE AND ENTERED APPEARANCES OF COUNSEL. SEND MQ: Yes. The schedule is set as follows: to be set. Preliminary Injunction Appeal. Circuit Rule 3-3. [10378209] (RT) [Entered: 03/30/2017 04:20 PM]

Filed (ECF) notice of appearance of Sharon Marie Swingle for Appellants John F. Kelly, Rex W. Tillerson, Donald J. Trump, U.S. Department of State, USA and USDHS. Date of service: 03/31/2017. [10378601] [17-15589] (Swingle, Sharon) [Entered: 03/31/2017 09:15 AM]

Filed order (MICHAEL DALY HAWKINS, RONALD M. GOULD and RICHARD A. PAEZ) The Governmentâ€™s consent motion to issue the mandate, Dkt. No. [316], is GRANTED. The mandate shall issue immediately. [10479792] (OC) [Entered: 06/19/2017 04:27 PM]
MANDATE ISSUED.(MDH, RMG and RAP) [10479819] (Turcios, Margoth) [Entered: 06/19/2017 04:38 PM]
Supreme Court Case Info Case number: 16-1540 Filed on: 06/26/2017 Cert Petition Action 1: Pending [10490185] (RR) [Entered: 06/27/2017 04:54 PM]

Received Order from the Supreme Court, dated 07/19/2017: The Governmentâ€™s motion seeking clarification of our order of June 26, 2017, is denied. The District Court order modifying the preliminary injunction with respect to refugees covered by a formal assurance is stayed pending resolution of the Governmentâ€™s appeal to the Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit. Justice Thomas, Justice Alito, and Justice Gorsuch would have stayed the District Court order in its entirety. Supreme Court No. 16-1540 (16A1191). [10513973] (HH) [Entered: 07/19/2017 10:10 AM]
Supreme Court Case Info Case number: 16-1540 Filed on: 06/26/2017 Cert Petition Action 1: Pending Notes: CD of sealed district court documents sent. [10528989] (SOS) [Entered: 08/01/2017 01:39 PM]

Supreme Court Case Info Case number: 16-1540 Filed on: 06/26/2017 Cert Petition Action 1: Granted, 06/26/2017 Notes: CD of sealed district court documents sent. [10529400] (SVG) [Entered: 08/01/2017 03:15 PM]

Supreme Court Case Info Case number: 16-1540 Filed on: 06/26/2017 Cert Petition Action 1: Granted, 06/26/2017 Ruling: Vacated/Remanded, 10/24/2017 Judgment Date: 10/24/2017 Notes: CD of sealed district court documents sent. to remand case to 9th Circuit, to recall the mandate [10641801] (RL) [Entered: 11/02/2017 03:00 PM]

Filed clerk order (Deputy Clerk: RL): The mandate issued on 06/19/2017 is recalled purusant to the Supreme Court's 10/24/17 order vacating and remanding the judgment of this Court. --[Edited 11/02/2017 by SVG to reflect correct reason for recalling mandate and to remove incorrect clerk order] [10641803] (RL) [Entered: 11/02/2017 03:02 PM]

Order filed for PUBLICATION (MICHAEL DALY HAWKINS, RONALD M. GOULD and RICHARD A. PAEZ) In view of the Supreme Court order dated October 24, 2017, the court's opinion filed June 12, 2017, is vacated and the appeal is dismissed as moot. The case is remanded to the district court with directions to dismiss as moot the challenge to Executive Order No. 13,780. The filing of this order shall serve as the court's mandate. [] [10642054] (RMM) [Entered: 11/02/2017 04:19 PM]

Received copy of District Court order filed on 11/02/2017. EO: In view of the Ninth Circuit's November 2, 2017 order (Dkt. No. 399) vacating its June 12, 2017 opinion, dismissing the appeal as moot, and issuing the mandate in No. 17-15589, the Court hereby dismisses as moot the challenge to Executive Order No. 13,780. IT IS SO ORDERED. (JUDGE DERRICK K. WATSON)(tyk) [10642635] (RL) [Entered: 11/03/2017 10:39 AM]

COURT DELETED INCORRECT ENTRY. Wrong case (meant for 17-17168). Notice about deletion sent to case participants registered for electronic filing. Original Text: Filed clerk order (Deputy Clerk: PA): C-Span applied to broadcast live and video/audio record for later broadcast, the case captioned above, scheduled to be heard at The William K. Nakamura Courthouse in Seattle, WA on Wednesday, December 6, 2017. C-Spans request to broadcast live and video/audio record for later broadcast is GRANTED. C-Span will serve as the pool-feed for all media organizations that submit an application. [10663584] (PA) [Entered: 11/21/2017 03:53 PM]
